articles.title: Niger's president vows democracy will prevail after mutinous soldiers detain him and declare a coup - The Associated Press

articles.author: Radina Gigova, Anna Chernova, Sophie Tanno
articles.title: Isolated Putin tries to shore up African support as Kremlin seethes over poor summit turnout - CNN
articles.description: A summit between Russian President Vladimir Putin and African leaders began in St. Petersburg on Thursday, with a far lower turnout than previous years.
articles.content:
A summit between Russian President Vladimir Putin and African leaders began in St. Petersburg on Thursday, with a far lower turnout than previous years.
Just 17 heads of African states are attending… [+3505 chars]

articles.title: African leaders arrive in Russia for summit as Kremlin seeks allies amid fighting in Ukraine - Arab News
